juzs.text: La Yadhuquna Fiha Bardaan Wa La Sharabaan
La Yasma`una Fiha Laghwan Wa La Kidhabaan
Rabbi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Ma Baynahuma Ar-Rahmani La Yamlikuna Minhu Khitabaan
Yawma Yaqumu Ar-Ruhu Wa Al-Mala'ikatu Saffaan La Yatakallamuna 'Illa Man 'Adhina Lahu Ar-Rahmanu Wa Qala Sawabaan
Dhalika Al-Yawmu Al-Haqqu Faman Sha'a Attakhadha 'Ila Rabbihi Ma'abaan
Inna 'Andharnakum `Adhabaan Qaribaan Yawma Yanzuru Al-Mar'u Ma Qaddamat Yadahu Wa Yaqulu Al-Kafiru Ya Laytani Kuntu Turabaan
Idh Nadahu Rabbuhu Bil-Wadi Al-Muqaddasi Tuaan
Fa'akhadhahu Allahu Nakala Al-'Akhirati Wa Al-'Ula
Inna Fi Dhalika La`ibratan Liman Yakhsha
Wa 'Amma Man Khafa Maqama Rabbihi Wa Naha An-Nafsa `Ani Al-Hawa
Ka'annahum Yawma Yarawnaha Lam Yalbathu 'Illa `Ashiyatan 'Aw Đuhaha
Likulli Amri'in Minhum Yawma'idhin Sha'nun Yughnihi
Wa Ma Huwa Biqawli Shaytanin Rajimin
Wa Ma Tasha'una 'Illa 'An Yasha'a Allahu Rabbu Al-`Alamina
Ya 'Ayyuha Al-'Insanu Ma Gharraka Birabbika Al-Karimi
Yawma La Tamliku Nafsun Linafsin Shay'aan Wa Al-'Amru Yawma'idhin Lillahi
Wa Ma Yukadhibu Bihi 'Illa Kullu Mu`tadin 'Athimin
Kalla Bal Rana `Ala Qulubihim Ma Kanu Yaksibuna
Thumma Yuqalu Hadha Al-Ladhi Kuntum Bihi Tukadhibuna
Khitamuhu Miskun Wa Fi Dhalika Falyatanafasi Al-Mutanafisuna
Inna Al-Ladhina 'Ajramu Kanu Mina Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Yađhakuna
Hal Thuwiba Al-Kuffaru Ma Kanu Yaf`aluna
YA 'AyyuhA Al-'InsAnu 'Innaka KAdiA¥un 'IlA¡ Rabbika KadA¥Aan FamulAqA«hi
IllA Al-LadhA«na 'A€manA« Wa `AmilA« AAY-AzAliA¥Ati Lahum 'Ajrun Ghayru MamnA«nin
Wa Hum `Ala Ma Yaf`aluna Bil-Mu'uminina Shuhudun
Wa Ma Naqamu Minhum 'Illa 'An Yu'uminu Billahi Al-`Azizi Al-Hamidi
Al-Ladhi Lahu Mulku As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Allahu `Ala Kulli Shay'in Shahidun
Inna Al-Ladhina Fatanu Al-Mu'uminina Wa Al-Mu'uminati Thumma Lam Yatubu Falahum `Adhabu Jahannama Wa Lahum `Adhabu Al-Hariqi
Inna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Lahum Jannatun Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Dhalika Al-Fawzu Al-Kabiru
Yakhruju Min Bayni As-Sulbi Wa At-Tara'ibi
Fama Lahu Min Quwatin Wa La Nasirin
Illa Ma Sha'a Allahu 'Innahu Ya`lamu Al-Jahra Wa Ma Yakhfa
Thumma La Yamutu Fiha Wa La Yahya
La Yusminu Wa La Yughni Min Ju`in
Hal Fi Dhalika Qasamun Lidhi Hijrin
Alam Tara Kayfa Fa`ala Rabbuka Bi`adin
Allati Lam Yukhlaq Mithluha Fi Al-Biladi
Wa Thamuda Al-Ladhina Jabu As-Sakhra Bil-Wadi
Fa'amma Al-'Insanu 'Idha Ma Abtalahu Rabbuhu Fa'akramahu Wa Na``amahu Fayaqulu Rabbi 'Akramani
Wa 'Amma 'Idha Ma Abtalahu Faqadara `Alayhi Rizqahu Fayaqulu Rabbi 'Ahanani
Wa Ja'a Rabbuka Wa Al-Malaku Saffaan Saffaan
Wa Ji'a Yawma'idhin Bijahannama Yawma'idhin Yatadhakkaru Al-'Insanu Wa 'Anna Lahu Adh-Dhikra
Thumma Kana Mina Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa Tawasaw Bis-Sabri Wa Tawasaw Bil-Marhamahi
Wa Al-Ladhina Kafaru Bi'ayatina Hum 'Ashabu Al-Mash'amahi
Faqala Lahum Rasulu Allahi Naqata Allahi Wa Suqyaha
Fakadhabuhu Fa`aqaruha Fadamdama `Alayhim Rabbuhum Bidhanbihim Fasawwaha
Wa Ma Khalaqa Adh-Dhakara Wa Al-'Untha
Wa Ma Li'hadin `Indahu Min Ni`matin Tujza
Ma Wadda`aka Rabbuka Wa Ma Qala
Wa Lal'akhiratu Khayrun Laka Mina Al-'Ula
Illa Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Falahum 'Ajrun Ghayru Mamnunin
Kalla La'in Lam Yantahi Lanasfa`a Bin-Nasiyahi
Kalla La Tuti`hu Wa Asjud Waqtarib
Tanazzalu Al-Mala'ikatu Wa Ar-Ruhu Fiha Bi'idhni Rabbihim Min Kulli 'Amrin
Lam Yakuni Al-Ladhina Kafaru Min 'Ahli Al-Kitabi Wa Al-Mushrikina Munfakkina Hatta Ta'tiyahumu Al-Bayyinahu
Rasulun Mina Allahi Yatlu Suhufaan Mutahharahan
Wa Ma Tafarraqa Al-Ladhina 'Utu Al-Kitaba 'Illa Min Ba`di Ma Ja'at/humu Al-Bayyinahu
Wa Ma 'Umiru 'Illa Liya`budu Allaha Mukhlisina Lahu Ad-Dina Hunafa'a Wa Yuqimu As-Salaata Wa Yu'utu Az-Zakaata Wa Dhalika Dinu Al-Qayyimahi
Inna Al-Ladhina Kafaru Min 'Ahli Al-Kitabi Wa Al-Mushrikina Fi Nari Jahannama Khalidina Fiha 'Ula'ika Hum Sharru Al-Bariyahi
Inna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati 'Ula'ika Hum Khayru Al-Bariyahi
Jaza'uuhum `Inda Rabbihim Jannatu `Adnin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Khalidina Fiha 'Abadaan Rađiya Allahu `Anhum Wa Rađu `Anhu Dhalika Liman Khashiya Rabbahu
Faman Ya`mal Mithqala Dharratin Khayraan Yarahu
Wa Man Ya`mal Mithqala Dharratin Sharraan Yarahu
Afala Ya`lamu 'Idha Bu`thira Ma Fi Al-Quburi
Illa Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Wa Tawasaw Bil-Haqqi Wa Tawasaw Bis-Sabri
Alam Tara Kayfa Fa`ala Rabbuka Bi'ashabi Al-Fil
Al-Ladhi 'At`amahum Min Ju`in Wa 'Amanahum Min Khawfin
Idha Ja'a Nasru Allahi Wa Al-Fathu
Wa Ra'ayta An-Nasa Yadkhuluna Fi Dini Allahi 'Afwajaan
Fasabbih Bihamdi Rabbika Wa Astaghfirhu 'Innahu Kana Tawwabaan
Wa Min Sharri An-Naffathati Fi Al-`Uqadi
